fields.label: SDC
fields.description: SDC for which the parent SDI "softlink" reference is of

fields.label: Keyid 1
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Keyid 2
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Keyid 3
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Paramlist
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Paramlist Version
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Variant
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Dataset
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Param
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdiDataItem, this field is a reference to the parent sdiDataItem

fields.label: Param Type
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdiDataItem, this field is a reference to the parent sdiDataItem

fields.label: Replicate
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdiDataItem, this field is a reference to the parent sdiDataItem

fields.label: Spec
fields.description: ID of the Spec for this sdispec.

fields.label: Spec Version
fields.description: Specific Version of the Spec for this sdispec.

fields.label: Limittype
fields.description: Named Range assigned by the specification upon determining in which limit range the 'checked' value is in.

fields.label: Condition
fields.description: Condition assigned by the specification upon determining in which limit range the 'checked' value is in.

fields.label: Waived Flag
fields.description: <Not Used>

fields.label: User Sequence
fields.description: Used to sequence multiple records for presentation usually within context of a parent

fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Long textual notes about this SDI

fields.label: Audit Sequence
fields.description: Number of Audit Records for this record.  Used to allocate the key for the next audit record.

fields.label: Auditdefer Flag
fields.description: Internal column controlling when an Audit Record will be suppressed, Y-Suppressed, [N]-CreateAuditRecord

fields.label: Tracelog
fields.description: Reference to the tracelog table that contains the ESIG information including the modification reason

fields.label: Create Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was created

fields.label: Create By
fields.description: User logged in who created this record

fields.label: Create Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Created the Record

fields.label: Mod Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was last modified

fields.label: Mod By
fields.description: User logged in who last modified this record

fields.label: Mod Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Modified the Record

fields.label: Display Value
fields.description: Reformatted text according to the DisplayFormat rule.  It is the DisplayFormat that is typically shown on reports and screens.  This displayformat is used when different specifications have a different DisplayFormat then the underlying paramlistitem.

fields.label: Report Flag
fields.description: YN Flag to indicate that the specifciation indicated that this specific parameter is to be reported.  This is honored in the respective reporting definitions

fields.label: Transform Value
fields.description: Numeric Result after applying the spec's transformrule.  It is this transformvalue that then is copied to the sdidataitemspec.checkvalue for checking against the spec limits.

fields.label: Checked Value
fields.description: For numeric datatypes, this is the value that is checked against the specificaiton.  Note that this value is after the specparamitems.transformrule has been applied.

fields.label: Checkedtext
fields.description: For textual datatypes, this is the value that is checked against the specification

relations.label: Dataitem
relations.description: Detail table for a SDI which commonly is referred to as the "DataItem".  The Dataitem defines a single result, observation or measurement and contains the actual value.
relations.relationship: [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[SDCID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[SDCID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[KEYID1] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[KEYID1] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[KEYID2] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[KEYID2] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[KEYID3] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[KEYID3] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[PARAMLISTID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[PARAMLISTID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[PARAMLISTVERSIONID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[PARAMLISTVERSIONID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[VARIANTID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[VARIANTID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[DATASET] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[DATASET] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[PARAMID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[PARAMID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[PARAMTYPE] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[PARAMTYPE] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEMSPEC].[REPLICATEID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[REPLICATEID]
relations.where: SDIDATAITEMSPEC.SDCID = SDIDATAITEM.SDCID AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.KEYID1 = SDIDATAITEM.KEYID1 AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.KEYID2 = SDIDATAITEM.KEYID2 AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.KEYID3 = SDIDATAITEM.KEYID3 AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.PARAMLISTID = SDIDATAITEM.PARAMLISTID AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.PARAMLISTVERSIONID = SDIDATAITEM.PARAMLISTVERSIONID AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.VARIANTID = SDIDATAITEM.VARIANTID AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.DATASET = SDIDATAITEM.DATASET AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.PARAMID = SDIDATAITEM.PARAMID AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.PARAMTYPE = SDIDATAITEM.PARAMTYPE AND SDIDATAITEMSPEC.REPLICATEID = SDIDATAITEM.REPLICATEID

relations.label: specification
relations.description: Definition of a set of limits and rules that are used to evaluate the quality of data that is entered on a SDI

relations.label: Limit Type
relations.description: Enumeration of named limit classifications for Parameter Limits like Detection, or Absurdity Limits.  Also used to enumerate the limit classification of different limit ranges for Specification Limits

description: Detail table for a SDI which commonly is referred to as the "DataItem".  The Dataitem defines a single result, observation or measurement and contains the actual value.

fields.label: SDC
fields.description: SDC for which the parent SDI "softlink" reference is of

fields.label: Keyid 1
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Keyid 2
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Keyid 3
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Paramlist
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Paramlist Version
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Variant
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Dataset
fields.description: As this record is a child of the sdidata Dataset, this field is a reference to the parent sdidata Dataset

fields.label: Param
fields.description: Name of the result

fields.label: Param Type
fields.description: Type of the result.  Typical types may be Standard [default], Average, RPD, etc.

fields.label: Replicate
fields.description: Invidual number of the result.  Used to distingquish between the multiple results when using mulitple replciates.  Starts with 1.

fields.label: Alias
fields.description: Alternate name for this parameter

fields.label: Mandatory Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating if this result must be filled in for the sdidata Dataset status to advance to 'DataEntered'

fields.label: Datatypes
fields.description: Different types of results for this parameter.  Code value N-Numeric, T-Text, NC-Numeric with Calculation, D-DateTime, O-DateOnly, R-ReferenceType, V-ValidatedReferenceType, S-SDCReference

fields.label: Entered Value
fields.description: Parsed numeric portion of the EnteredText value

fields.label: Enteredtext
fields.description: Text entered value as typed in by the analyst or grabbed from the instrument for this result.

fields.label: Entered Units
fields.description: Parsed unit that was entered with the EnteredText value

fields.label: Operator Rule
fields.description: <Deprecated>

fields.label: Transform Value
fields.description: Numeric Result after applying the transformrule.  It is this transformvalue that is passed to downstream calculations and tested against parameter and specification limits

fields.label: Transform Date
fields.description: Date Result after applying the transformrule.  It is this transformvalue that is passed to downstream calculations and tested against parameter and specification limits

fields.label: Transformtext
fields.description: Text Result after applying the transformrule.  It is this transformvalue that is passed to downstream calculations and tested against parameter and specification limits

fields.label: Transform Rule
fields.description: Calculation expression to "transform" a value for a result to a differnet value to be used for calculation input and to apply limits against.  See sdidataitem.transformvalue.

fields.label: Display Value
fields.description: Reformatted text according to the DisplayFormat rule.  It is the DisplayFormat that is typically shown on reports and screens

fields.label: Display Units
fields.description: Unit of Measure for the result

fields.label: Displayformat
fields.description: Display Format rule used to generate a result's displayValue

fields.label: Rangeoperator
fields.description: <Deprecated>

fields.label: Enteredqualifier
fields.description: Parsed <> qualifier that was entered with the EnteredText value

fields.label: Entry SDC
fields.description: For DataType of S, this indicates which SDC

fields.label: Entryreftype
fields.description: For Datatypes of V or R, this indicates which ReferenceType

fields.label: Calc Rule
fields.description: Expression detailing how this result is to be calculated.  Expressoins may use either the LabVantage syntax or Groovy

fields.label: Measurementaction
fields.description: <Deprecated>

fields.label: Released Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that this result has been acknowledged.  After which the result is protected from changes.

fields.label: Value Status
fields.description: Code indicating the types of error on entry for a dataitem.  Null indicates no error.  Possible errors are  INVALID_SDI, INVALID_DATE_FORMAT, NON_NUMERIC, INVALID_UNITS.  [This is not an exhaustive list]

fields.label: Condition
fields.description: Condition for this result.

fields.label: Transformdefer Flag
fields.description: YN Flag, but should actually be labeled as "transformignoreflag" because setting this flag will bypass the transformationrules.

fields.label: Textcolor
fields.description: <Deprecated>

fields.label: User Sequence
fields.description: Used to sequence multiple records for presentation usually within context of a parent

fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Long textual notes about this SDI

fields.label: Audit Sequence
fields.description: Number of Audit Records for this record.  Used to allocate the key for the next audit record.

fields.label: Auditdefer Flag
fields.description: Internal column controlling when an Audit Record will be suppressed, Y-Suppressed, [N]-CreateAuditRecord

fields.label: Tracelog
fields.description: Reference to the tracelog table that contains the ESIG information including the modification reason

fields.label: Create Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was created

fields.label: Create By
fields.description: User logged in who created this record

fields.label: Create Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Created the Record

fields.label: Mod Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was last modified

fields.label: Mod By
fields.description: User logged in who last modified this record

fields.label: Acoverridden Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that the certificatino requirement for this dataset has been overriden when the result was entered

fields.label: Mod Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Modified the Record

fields.label: Analyst
fields.description: User ID responsible for performing Data Entry on this result

fields.label: Qceval Status
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that this result caused an AQC QCBatch evaluation violation

fields.label: Displayvalueformat
fields.description: NEED TO TALK TO CHEN

fields.label: Calcexclude Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that this result should be excluded from subsequent calculations to indicate that it is an outlier

fields.label: Sdidataitem
fields.description: Internally assigned assession number as an alternate key to this record

fields.label: Instrument
fields.description: Instrument which was used to capture this result

fields.label: Instrumentfield
fields.description: Logical field coming from an instrument for  taking data directly from syncronous "simple" instruments.

relations.label: Dataset
relations.description: Detail table for a SDI which commonly is referred to as the "Dataset". The Dataset defines a group of results, observations or measurements for a single step of a test.  The Step may be a single operation conducted by an analyst during data entry like Pre
relations.relationship: [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[SDCID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATA].[SDCID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[KEYID1] = [FINAL].[SDIDATA].[KEYID1] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[KEYID2] = [FINAL].[SDIDATA].[KEYID2] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[KEYID3] = [FINAL].[SDIDATA].[KEYID3] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[PARAMLISTID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATA].[PARAMLISTID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[PARAMLISTVERSIONID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATA].[PARAMLISTVERSIONID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[VARIANTID] = [FINAL].[SDIDATA].[VARIANTID] AND [FINAL].[SDIDATAITEM].[DATASET] = [FINAL].[SDIDATA].[DATASET]
relations.where: SDIDATAITEM.SDCID = SDIDATA.SDCID AND SDIDATAITEM.KEYID1 = SDIDATA.KEYID1 AND SDIDATAITEM.KEYID2 = SDIDATA.KEYID2 AND SDIDATAITEM.KEYID3 = SDIDATA.KEYID3 AND SDIDATAITEM.PARAMLISTID = SDIDATA.PARAMLISTID AND SDIDATAITEM.PARAMLISTVERSIONID = SDIDATA.PARAMLISTVERSIONID AND SDIDATAITEM.VARIANTID = SDIDATA.VARIANTID AND SDIDATAITEM.DATASET = SDIDATA.DATASET

relations.label: parameter
relations.description: Enumeration of the different parameters that can be defined in parameterlists and results(sdidataitems)

relations.label: unit
relations.description: Individual Units of Measure, or Units of Inventory

relations.label: user
relations.description: A permitted user of the system.

relations.label: unit
relations.description: Individual Units of Measure, or Units of Inventory

relations.label: Equipment
relations.description: Definition of the connected hardware devices used to return information to the system

label: Dataitem

descriptions.en: Detail table for a SDI which commonly is referred to as the "DataItem".  The Dataitem defines a single result, observation or measurement and contains the actual value.

description: Detail table for a SDI which commonly is referred to as the "Dataset". The Dataset defines a group of results, observations or measurements for a single step of a test.  The Step may be a single operation conducted by an analyst during data entry like Pre

fields.label: SDC
fields.description: SDC for which the parent SDI "softlink" reference is of

fields.label: Keyid 1
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Keyid 2
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Keyid 3
fields.description: "softlink" reference to the parent SDI for which this is a child detail of

fields.label: Paramlist
fields.description: ID of the parameter List for this dataset.  This is the name of the test step or operation.

fields.label: Paramlist Version
fields.description: Version of the parameter List for this dataset.

fields.label: Variant
fields.description: Variant of the parameter List for this dataset.

fields.label: Dataset
fields.description: Repeat Instance number of this dataset.  This is incremented for each clone of the dataset for additional remeasures or retests.

fields.label: Limitrule
fields.description: Reference to the LimitRule for this ParameterList.  The Limit Rule defines the behavior when the parameter limits are either met or not met.

fields.label: Limitrule Version
fields.description: Reference to the LimitRule for this ParameterList.  The Limit Rule defines the behavior when the parameter limits are either met or not met.

fields.label: Modifiable Flag
fields.description: YN flag indicating that the sdidata Dataset may be modified.  If yes, then you may add or remove sdidataitems.

fields.label: Approvalsequence Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that the approval steps must be satisified in order

fields.label: Approvalpass Rule
fields.description: Flag indicating the rule for determining the overall disposition of the approval.

fields.label: Condition
fields.description: Condition for this dataset.  Assigned by the user, or LimitRule

fields.label: Availability Flag
fields.description: YN Flag to indicate that the dataset should be shown in the data entry page.  Typically the procedural dataset is not available until the preparation is complete.

fields.label: Workflow
fields.description: When the sdidata record is added as a result of adding a paramlist workflow, this indicates which workflow added this sdidata dataset.

fields.label: Workflow Version
fields.description: When the sdidata record is added as a result of adding a paramlist workflow, this indicates which workflow added this sdidata dataset.

fields.label: Workflow Instance
fields.description: When the sdidata record is added as a result of adding a paramlist workflow, this indicates which workflow added this sdidata dataset.

fields.label: User Sequence
fields.description: Used to sequence multiple records for presentation usually within context of a parent

fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Long textual notes about this SDI

fields.label: Audit Sequence
fields.description: Number of Audit Records for this record.  Used to allocate the key for the next audit record.

fields.label: Auditdefer Flag
fields.description: Internal column controlling when an Audit Record will be suppressed, Y-Suppressed, [N]-CreateAuditRecord

fields.label: Tracelog
fields.description: Reference to the tracelog table that contains the ESIG information including the modification reason

fields.label: Create Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was created

fields.label: Create By
fields.description: User logged in who created this record

fields.label: Create Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Created the Record

fields.label: Mod Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was last modified

fields.label: Mod By
fields.description: User logged in who last modified this record

fields.label: Mod Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Modified the Record

fields.label: Dataset Status
fields.description: State of this sdidata record.  Permissible states are Initial, InProgress, DataEntered, Released, or Completed

fields.label: Notebookreference
fields.description: Information Only field to record a paper notebook reference for this dataset.

fields.label: Assignedanalyst
fields.description: Reference to the user who is assigned to perform data entry on this sdidata Dataset.

fields.label: Instrument
fields.description: Reference to the Instrument that is assigned to this sdidata Dataset.  After data Entered, this may also be the Instrument that was used for the dataset.

fields.label: Retested Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that this sdidata Dataset has been retested.

fields.label: Icoverridden Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that the certificatino requirement for this dataset has been overriden when the instrument was assigned

fields.label: Remeasured Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that this sdidata Dataset has been remeasured.

fields.label: Remeasure Instance
fields.description: When this sdidata Dataset has been remeasured, this indicates the dataset instance that it was remeasured from.

fields.label: Qcbatch
fields.description: Reference to the ACQ QCBatch position when this dataset is analysed in the AQC set.

fields.label: Qcbatchitem
fields.description: Reference to the ACQ QCBatch position when this dataset is analysed in the AQC set.

fields.label: Trackitem
fields.description: For Stability samples, indicates for which ContainerGroup the testing is for

fields.label: Scheduleplan
fields.description: For Stability samples, indicates for which pull this testing is for.  This is used to denote the timepoint when using  Container ReUse testing that which associates multiple repeats of this test, one for each timepoint.

fields.label: Scheduleplanitem
fields.description: For Stability samples, indicates for which pull this testing is for.  This is used to denote the timepoint when using  Container ReUse testing that which associates multiple repeats of this test, one for each timepoint.

fields.label: Uniqueness Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that the individual steps must be completed by individual distinct users

fields.label: Approval Flag
fields.description: Flag indicating the result of the overall Approval for this sdidata Dataset.  P-Step Passes or Accepted, F- Step Fails or Rejected, U-Step Undetermined (initial value)

fields.label: Sdidata
fields.description: Internally assigned assession number as an alternate key to this record

fields.label: Sourceworkitem
fields.description: Reference to the sdiworkitem that created this sdidata Dataset.  This is notionally the "parent" of this sdidata Dataset.

fields.label: Sourceworkitem Instance
fields.description: Reference to the sdiworkitem that created this sdidata Dataset.  This is notionally the "parent" of this sdidata Dataset.

fields.label: Cancellable Flag
fields.description: YN flag indicating that the sdidata Dataset may be cancelled.

fields.label: Document
fields.description: eNotebook worksheet that is bound to this dataset.  This may be an active or completed worksheet.

fields.label: Document Version
fields.description: eNotebook worksheet that is bound to this dataset.  This may be an active or completed worksheet.

fields.label: Block Flag
fields.description: YN Flag to indicate that the dataset is blocked from data entry.  Typically this is indicative if the dataset is associated with an eNotebook worksheet.

relations.label: SDC
relations.description: Meta data for the SDC definition including options, security settings, friendly names, etc

relations.label: Analysis
relations.description: A collection of parameters that are defined together for capturing of data in a single step of a test method.
relations.where: SDIDATA.PARAMLISTID = PARAMLIST.PARAMLISTID AND SDIDATA.PARAMLISTVERSIONID = PARAMLIST.PARAMLISTVERSIONID AND SDIDATA.VARIANTID = PARAMLIST.VARIANTID

relations.label: limit rule
relations.description: Defines behavior of when parameter limits are met and not met including subsequent calculations, and visual presentation.

relations.label: Organization
relations.description: User Grouping representing Sites, Custodial Domains, Laboratories, External Shipping Locations or any other grouping of users.  Used as ownership of key SDIs for implementing Departmental Security.

relations.label: user
relations.description: A permitted user of the system.

relations.label: trackitem
relations.description: Stores information about an entity that needs to be tracked.  That is either tracking how much (Inventory), who has it (custodialship), or where it is (Location)

relations.label: scheduleplanitem
relations.description: An individual item that is scheduled.  For reoccurring tasks, this defines the frequency, what gets schedule, what meta data properties are defined, when it starts, and ends.  For stability tasks this is an individual sample pull and its meta data propert

relations.label: Equipment
relations.description: Definition of the connected hardware devices used to return information to the system

relations.label: Document
relations.description: Instance of a an eForm form which includes a workflow  and state

label: Dataset

descriptions.en: Detail table for a SDI which commonly is referred to as the "Dataset". The Dataset defines a group of results, observations or measurements for a single step of a test.  The Step may be a single operation conducted by an analyst during data entry like Pre

description: Instance object representing a Sample in LIMS

fields.label: Sample ID
fields.description: Primary Key identifier of this SDI.  Notionally this is referred to as the "KeyID" of the SDI.

fields.label: Description
fields.description: Short description or title of this SDI

fields.label: Sample Type ID
fields.description: For Biobanking samples, this references the type of biological sample that this sample is from.  For Quality Management samples, this references the broad class of samples that are managed by the QM system.  Typically this includes values like RawMaterial

fields.label: Creation Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was created

fields.label: Created By
fields.description: User logged in who created this record

fields.label: Create Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Created the Record

fields.label: Mod Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was last modified

fields.label: Mod By
fields.description: User logged in who last modified this record

fields.label: Mod Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Modified the Record

fields.label: Auditdefer Flag
fields.description: Internal column controlling when an Audit Record will be suppressed, Y-Suppressed, [N]-CreateAuditRecord

fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Long textual notes about this SDI

fields.label: Audit Sequence
fields.description: Number of Audit Records for this record.  Used to allocate the key for the next audit record.

fields.label: Tracelog
fields.description: Reference to the tracelog table that contains the ESIG information including the modification reason

fields.label: User Sequence
fields.description: Used to sequence multiple records for presentation usually within context of a parent

fields.label: Review flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that a final review is required on this sample.  When N, consider the sample as "finished" simply when all testing is completed.

fields.label: Priority
fields.description: Information Only indication of the Sample Priority

fields.label: Disposal Status
fields.description: State of the disposal for this sample.  Permissble states are [Not Disposed], Marked for Disposal, Disposed, or Retained

fields.label: Sample Status
fields.description: State of this sample record.  Permissible states are Initial, Received, InProgress, Completed, Reviewed, or Disposed

fields.label: Collection Date
fields.description: For Biobanking samples, this indicates when the sample was collected

fields.label: Received Date
fields.description: Date and Time the sample is Received

fields.label: Physical Condition
fields.description: Indication of the physical condition of the sample typically entered during Sample Reciept

fields.label: Batch ID
fields.description: For QualityManagement samples, this references the parent manufacturing batch for which this sample is from

fields.label: Product ID
fields.description: For QualityManagement samples, this references the definitional item that this sample is taken from

fields.label: Project
fields.description: For Research samples, this references a parent project entity containing this sample.

fields.label: Sample Point
fields.description: For Scheduled samples from a SamplingPoint, this references the SamplePoint from where the sample is from

fields.label: Location
fields.description: <deprecated>

fields.label: Request ID
fields.description: For submitted samples, this references the parent request that this sample is from.

fields.label: Start Testing Date
fields.description: Date and Time the sample had is first test result entered

fields.label: Completed Date
fields.description: Date that all testing was completed on his sample.  E.g. All Datasets have transistioned to datasetStatus=Completed.

fields.label: Disposal Date
fields.description: Date and Time the sample is Disposed

fields.label: Due Date
fields.description: Date for which this sample is due

fields.label: Basedonsample
fields.description: Circular reference relating this sample to a parent sample.

fields.label: Collected By
fields.description: For Biobanking samples, this indicates who collected the sample

fields.label: Template Flag
fields.description: Indicates that this is a special SDI that is used as an template for creating other SDIs.  Y-Yes, N-No

fields.label: Received By
fields.description: User who received the sample

fields.label: Disposed By
fields.description: User who disposed the sample

fields.label: Reviewed By
fields.description: User that performed the final review on this sample

fields.label: Reviewed Date
fields.description: Date and Time that this sample was reviewed

fields.label: Review Disposition
fields.description: Disposition that was assigned to this sample during its review.  Possible values are Aproved, Rejected.

fields.label: Reviewer Remarks
fields.description: Any comments given during the final review on this sample

fields.label: Numberlabels
fields.description: For label printing the number of labels to print for this sample.  Typically this represents the number of containers for this sample

fields.label: Control Substance
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that the sample is a controled substatnce. This requires a witnes identification and password when transferring custody

fields.label: Receiverequired Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that this sample is to be received.

fields.label: Cocrequired Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that this sample will require COC.  However, this is only used by the toolbar implementation of COC and not ASL

fields.label: Target Pull Date
fields.description: For Stability samples, this is the target pull date

fields.label: Autoreceive Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that the sample should automatically be received into the laboratory

fields.label: Autofinalrpt Flag
fields.description: <deprecated>

fields.label: Eventplan
fields.description: For Stability samples, this is the plan item of the stability grid that pulled this sample.

fields.label: Study
fields.description: For Stability samples,this references the parent stability study for which this sample is from

fields.label: Condition
fields.description: For Stability samples, this is the label of the storage condition.

fields.label: Eventplanitem
fields.description: For Stability samples, this is the plan item of the stability grid that pulled this sample.

fields.label: Timepoint
fields.description: For Stability samples, this is the label of the pull interval.

fields.label: Study
fields.description: For Biobanking samples, this references the parent study for which this sample is from

fields.label: Reagentlot
fields.description: For Reagent Quality or AQC Control samples, this references the ReagentLot that this sample is from

fields.label: Qcsample Type
fields.description: For AQC Testing, this indicates the type of the sample.  Possible types are Unknown, Standard, Control, Blank, etc.

fields.label: Date with TimeZone independance for PK Generation
Disposaltarget Date
fields.description: Date and Time the sample is scheduled to be Disposed

fields.label: Sourcesp
fields.description: For Quality Management samples, this is a reference to the SamplignPlan that created this sample

fields.label: Sourcesp Version
fields.description: For Quality Management samples, this is a reference to the SamplignPlan that created this sample

fields.label: Sourcesplevel
fields.description: For Quality Management samples, this is the level that was used when this sample was created.  Typically, Full or Reduced

fields.label: Sourcespsource Label
fields.description: For Quality Management samples, this is the source that from where the sample was sampled.  Typical values are TopOfDrum, Bottom, Middle, Composite

fields.label: Batchstage
fields.description: For QualityManagement samples, this references the parent manufacturing stage for which this sample is from

description: Instance entity to represent a Lot of material, which may be a Finished Product, Intermediate, or a received Raw Material

fields.label: Batch
fields.description: Primary Key identifier of this SDI.  Notionally this is referred to as the "KeyID" of the SDI.

fields.label: Description
fields.description: Short description or title of this SDI

fields.label: Create Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was created

fields.label: Date
fields.description: Date of the Batch

fields.label: Create By
fields.description: User logged in who created this record

fields.label: Status
fields.description: State of this batch record.  Permissible states are Initial, Received, InProgress, OnHold, Pending Release, Preliminary Release, Released, Rejected, and Reported

fields.label: Create Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Created the Record

fields.label: Mod Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was last modified

fields.label: Mod By
fields.description: User logged in who last modified this record

fields.label: Mod Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Modified the Record

fields.label: Auditdefer Flag
fields.description: Internal column controlling when an Audit Record will be suppressed, Y-Suppressed, [N]-CreateAuditRecord

fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Long textual notes about this SDI

fields.label: Audit Sequence
fields.description: Number of Audit Records for this record.  Used to allocate the key for the next audit record.

fields.label: Tracelog
fields.description: Reference to the tracelog table that contains the ESIG information including the modification reason

fields.label: User Sequence
fields.description: Used to sequence multiple records for presentation usually within context of a parent

fields.label: Template Flag
fields.description: Indicates that this is a special SDI that is used as an template for creating other SDIs.  Y-Yes, N-No

fields.label: Product
fields.description: This references the definitional item that this batch is of

fields.label: Number of times control sample is triggered
Released By
fields.description: User who Released or Dispositioned this batch.

fields.label: Batch Type
fields.description: Classification of the kind of batch.  Possible values are Raw Material, Intermediate, Finished, or Others

fields.label: Batchsize
fields.description: This defines the size of the batch, which may be used to determine how many samples to create

fields.label: Batchsize Units
fields.description: This defines the size of the batch

fields.label: Received Date
fields.description: For Raw Material Batches, this is the Date and Time this batch is Received at the loading dock.

fields.label: Received By
fields.description: Fpr Raw Material Batches, this is the User who received this batch at the loading doc.

fields.label: Released Date
fields.description: Date and Time this batch is Released or Dispositioned.

fields.label: Manufacture Date
fields.description: For Raw Material Batches, this is the manufacture's  date of the raw material lot

fields.label: Supplieraddress
fields.description: Reference to the address SDI that represents the supplier of this batch

fields.label: Prodvariantlotreference
fields.description: For Raw Material Batches, this is the manufacture's lot number of the raw material lot

fields.label: Supplieraddress Type
fields.description: Reference to the address SDI that represents the supplier of this batch

fields.label: Manufactureraddress
fields.description: Reference to the address SDI that represents the manufacture of this batch

fields.label: Manufactureraddress Type
fields.description: Reference to the address SDI that represents the manufacture of this batch

fields.label: Level
fields.description: Indication of the mode in which the batch was created.  Used for indicating Skiplot or Reduced Testing modes.

fields.label: Disposition
fields.description: Release disposition of the Batch used to evaluate the Skip Lot / Reduced Testing rules expressed in the ProductVariantRule.  Passed- the batch is released, Failed- the Batch was rejected (not released)

fields.label: Prodvariant
fields.description: Reference to the specific Product Variant record that was used for the creation of this batch.  This indicates the supplier, manufcature and/or the manufacturing site.

fields.label: Productionsiteaddress
fields.description: Reference to the address SDI that represents the manufacturingSite for this batch

fields.label: Productionsiteaddress Type
fields.description: Reference to the address SDI that represents the manufacturingSite for this batch

fields.label: ERP Class
fields.description: ERP Class

description: Definitional object that enumerates the different products that may be tested by recording samples or batches against

fields.label: ProductID
fields.description: Primary Key identifier of this SDI.  Notionally this is referred to as the "KeyID" of the SDI.

fields.label: Description
fields.description: Short description or title of this SDI

fields.label: Product Type
fields.description: Information only large classification of the different items.  May include RawMaterial, Finished, Intermediate, Research, etc.

fields.label: State
fields.description: If each stage is modeled as a separate item, this Information Only column is the stage.

fields.label: Create Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was created

fields.label: Control Substance
fields.description: YN Flag indicating if this item is a Control substance.  Control Substance may require adidtional user training and CoC handling

fields.label: Create By
fields.description: User logged in who created this record

fields.label: COC Required
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that samples this item will require COC.  However, this is only used by the toolbar implementation of COC and not ASL

fields.label: Create Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Created the Record

fields.label: Mod Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was last modified

fields.label: Mod By
fields.description: User logged in who last modified this record

fields.label: Mod Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Modified the Record

fields.label: Auditdefer Flag
fields.description: Internal column controlling when an Audit Record will be suppressed, Y-Suppressed, [N]-CreateAuditRecord

fields.label: Packaging
fields.description: Information only indication of how this item is packaged

fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Reference to the tracelog table that contains the ESIG information including the modification reason

fields.label: Audit Sequence
fields.description: Number of Audit Records for this record.  Used to allocate the key for the next audit record.

fields.label: Tracelog
fields.description: Reference to the tracelog table that contains the ESIG information including the modification reason

fields.label: User Sequence
fields.description: Used to sequence multiple records for presentation usually within context of a parent

fields.label: Material
fields.description: Information only reference to the underlying material of this particular item.

fields.label: Template Flag
fields.description: Indicates that this is a special SDI that is used as an template for creating other SDIs.  Y-Yes, N-No

fields.label: Strength
fields.description: Information only indication of what is the specific strength of this item

fields.label: Formulation
fields.description: Information only column representing the formulation indication of the item.  For example, Tablets, liquid, GelCaps, etc.

fields.label: NDC Number
fields.description: Information only value representing the NDC  (National Drug Code) of this item

fields.label: Container Type
fields.description: Information only indicating which packaging container is used for this item

fields.label: Batchsampletemplate
fields.description: When not using a SamplingPlan, this indicates which sample template to use for creating sample when the Batch is created

fields.label: Batchsample Count
fields.description: When not using a SamplingPlan, this indicates how many samples to create when a Batch is created.

fields.label: Disposaloffset
fields.description: Duration past the sample column in the calcuation of the target disposal date

fields.label: Disposaloffset Units
fields.description: Duration units used in the calculation of the target disposal date

fields.label: Disposalbasedon Rule
fields.description: Sample column that is used to calculate the sample's target disposal date

fields.label: Autorelease Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that the Batch should automatically be released iff all specifications have been passed

relations.label: material
relations.description: Definitional object that enumerates the common ingredient of a Product

relations.label: sample type
relations.description: Enumeration of the differnet SampleTypes that are permissible in the system.  These can be sampletype related to Quality management like Raw Material, Intermediate, or Finished.  Or these can be sampletypes related to different types of biological specimi

relations.label: sample
relations.description: Instance object representing a Sample in LIMS

relations.label: container type
relations.description: Master Data that enumerates a PackageType with quantity and package units

relations.label: unit
relations.description: Individual Units of Measure, or Units of Inventory

description: A collection of parameters that are defined together for capturing of data in a single step of a test method.

fields.label: Paramlist
fields.description: Primary Key identifier of this SDI.  Notionally this is referred to as the "KeyID" of the SDI.

fields.label: Paramlist Version
fields.description: Version number of this specific SDI.  Starts with 1.

fields.label: Variant
fields.description: Primary Key identifier of this SDI.  Notionally this is referred to as the "KeyID" of the SDI.

fields.label: Limitrule
fields.description: Reference to the LimitRule for this ParameterList.  The Limit Rule defines the behavior when the parameter limits are either met or not met.

fields.label: Limitrule Version
fields.description: Reference to the LimitRule for this ParameterList.  The Limit Rule defines the behavior when the parameter limits are either met or not met.

fields.label: Approvaltype
fields.description: Reference to the ApprovalType for this Paramlist.  The approval type defines how the coresponding sdidata Dataset is to be approved.

fields.label: Paramlist Description
fields.description: Short description or title of this SDI

fields.label: Modifiable Flag
fields.description: YN flag indicating that the sdidata Dataset may be modified.  If yes, then you may add or remove sdidataitems.

fields.label: User Sequence
fields.description: Used to sequence multiple records for presentation usually within context of a parent

fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Long textual notes about this SDI

fields.label: Audit Sequence
fields.description: Number of Audit Records for this record.  Used to allocate the key for the next audit record.

fields.label: Auditdefer Flag
fields.description: Internal column controlling when an Audit Record will be suppressed, Y-Suppressed, [N]-CreateAuditRecord

fields.label: Tracelog
fields.description: Reference to the tracelog table that contains the ESIG information including the modification reason

fields.label: Template Flag
fields.description: Indicates that this is a special SDI that is used as an template for creating other SDIs.  Y-Yes, N-No

fields.label: Create Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was created

fields.label: Create By
fields.description: User logged in who created this record

fields.label: Create Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Created the Record

fields.label: Mod Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was last modified

fields.label: Mod By
fields.description: User logged in who last modified this record

fields.label: Mod Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Modified the Record

fields.label: Paramlist Type
fields.description: Optional qualifier indicating what type of paramlist this may be.  Typically this may be Preparation, Procedural, or other.

fields.label: Version Status
fields.description: Indication of the state of this SDI version record.  Possible values are P - Provisional, C - Current, A - Active, or X - Expired.  Only one current version may exist for the SDI.

fields.label: Trainingreq Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that the sdidata Dataset requires a certified trained analyst to perform data entry.

fields.label: Overrideallowed Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that when the sdidata Dataset requires a certified trained analyst, the user may override this certification if they are not certified and they have permission to do so.

fields.label: Instrument Type
fields.description: When supplied, indicates that this paramlist and its sdidata Dataset requires an instrument of the specified type.

fields.label: Cancellable Flag
fields.description: YN flag indicating that the sdidata Dataset may be cancelled.

fields.label: Createworksheet Rule
fields.description: Directive to indicate how when the eNotebook worksheet will get created for the corresponding sdidata object.  Options include 'OnDemand', 'OnAssignment' or 'OnCreation'

fields.label: Instrumentmodel
fields.description: When supplied, indicates that this paramlist and its sdidata Dataset requires an instrument of the specified model.

relations.label: Organization

relations.label: user
relations.description: A permitted user of the system.

relations.label: Instrument Type
relations.description: A broad classificaiton of different instruments for differnet purposes.  A titrator, a balnance, a pH meter are examples of different Instrument types.

relations.label: limit rule
relations.description: Defines behavior of when parameter limits are met and not met including subsequent calculations, and visual presentation.

relations.label: approval type
relations.description: Master Data defining approvals, and specfiically who is to perform differnet steps and how the different steps interact and how overall approval verdict is determined.

relations.label: Instrument Model
relations.description: A specific classification of differnet instrumetns for a given instrumenttype.  It is presumed that different instrument models may behave differnetly in that what commands are sent, and how the response is parsed.

fields.description: Reference to the tracelog table that contains the ESIG information including the modification reason

fields.label: Template Flag
fields.description: Indicates that this is a special SDI that is used as an template for creating other SDIs.  Y-Yes, N-No

fields.label: Create Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was created

fields.label: Create By
fields.description: User logged in who created this record

fields.label: Create Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Created the Record

fields.label: Mod Date
fields.description: Date and Time this record was last modified

fields.label: Mod By
fields.description: User logged in who last modified this record

fields.label: Mod Tool
fields.description: Deprecated Column used to Show Application that Modified the Record

relations.label: report
relations.description: Definition of a registered report which may be either Jasper or BusinessObjects

relations.label: Organization
relations.description: User Grouping representing Sites, Custodial Domains, Laboratories, External Shipping Locations or any other grouping of users.  Used as ownership of key SDIs for implementing Departmental Security.
